sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on April 22, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.319 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 03, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -3.42% decrease from the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $44.63, the dividend yield is 2.86%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $44.63, representing a -2.96% decrease from the 52 week high of $45.99 and a 15.06% increase over the 52 week low of $38.79.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2015 as 7.26%, compared to an industry average of -2.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
